name: Glenda Athus, PharmD
title: Manager of Operations, Lead Pharmacist
shortBio: Glenda has been vital to the forward momentum of AEA by preparing various aspects of the organization including maintaining communication via quarterly newsletters, designing print and visual presentations for the broad promotion of the organization. Managing all aspects of preparing missionaries for weeklong activities on the mission field serving the needy and also creating and assisting with educational and spiritual activities for school aged children.  Assisted with the distribution of medications, partnering with the medical team to provide quality care to the needy.
